channel.title: Broadway on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Tom Francis Talks ‘Sunset Blvd.,’ Debut Eyewear Collection and His Favorite Pussycat Dolls Song
item.description: On the heels of his Broadway run alongside Nicole Scherzinger, the British actor’s latest endeavor is a collaboration with luxury eyewear brand Morgenthal Frederics.
